PROPER_NAME: This is displayed in the tooltip.
DESCRIPTION: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).
Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
For each Unexpected, repeat this card's other effects once. Then, gain Unexpected.
Negate the next time an enemy damages you, then randomly gain or lose 1 energy on the next turn.
Randomness in cards is reduced by 1 minimum and increased by 1 maximum per Variance (minimum 1, max 999.)
Unaffected by Variance and Loaded Dice.
Too much SoulGlad is bad for your health! (Lose HP equal to your SoulGlad each turn.)
Randomized values are are increased by 1 per Loaded Dice.
Taking damage removes one stack from this effect.
Only one instance of this effect can exist at a time.
